Class Emitter

java.lang.Object
  com.stickycoding.Rokon.DynamicObject
      com.stickycoding.Rokon.Emitter

public class Emitter
extends DynamicObject

The emitter is the spawning point for particles, much work is still needed to be done here

Author:
Richard
